synopsis.text:
Fu-chan, an enigmatic creature with a heart full of darkness, finds an unlikely friend in Ayumi Sakagami, a lonely transfer student in the bustling city of Minato Mirai, Yokohama. As the city buzzes with the triumphant tales of the Pretty Cures and their defeat of Fusion, Ayumi's life takes an unexpected turn when she stumbles upon Fu-chan on her way home from school.

Desperate to make Ayumi happy, Fu-chan uses its dark powers to eliminate everything that Ayumi dislikes, causing havoc in school and chaos throughout the city. As the situation escalates, the 28 Pretty Cures unite once more, determined to convey Ayumi's true feelings to Fu-chan and restore balance.

Meanwhile, Ayumi struggles to adapt to her new life in Yokohama, finding solace only in the company of her strange new friend. As the Pretty Cures search for scattered remnants of Fusion, they cross paths with Ayumi and Fu-chan, leading to a miraculous convergence of their powers and a dazzling light that promises hope and understanding.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
